'''0.2.2_01''' is a server version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released on October 30, 2010, at 21:13 UTC.<ref name=":0">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''<Notch> Ok, I've got a quick fix for the server''" [...] "''<Notch> there's a new minecraft server up, with a hack to fix the loading bug''" (21:13–21:14 UTC)</ref>

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a loading bug.<ref name=":0"/>
